title: Must see when in Athens
text: Beautiful site, great vieuw over Athens. Advise: go early in the morning because of the temperature and the light. We took the audiotour which is nice

title: Very nice place, for lunch, or drinks
text: Very nice place, for lunch, dinner or just an drink. Very good food. Good service. Nearby busy shopping street but quit cute little street.

title: Nice place for strolling, eating and relaxing
text: Very nice neighborhood in Athens. Good for dining and obviously the Acropolis! The Anafiotika is a must vistit. Near Plaka.

title: Stylish cafe with the best margaritas
text: Stylish cafe with the best margaritas. Very nice cafe, wide variaty of dri ks. Very good service, nice music.
